restrict.success: tts restricted to muted users only.

skip.tooShort: message is too short to skip (< 35 chars).
skip.error: an error occurred while trying to skip.

commands.help: im pretty sure this command is self-explanatory. it provides information about commands that this bot has to offer.
commands.voice:
changes the voice for your account. 

if you are curious about how the voices sound like, you may refer to supertonic's [voices](https://supertone-inc.github.io/supertonic-py/voices/) page.

-# voice preferences only affects the guild you use the command in so you can have different preferences per guild.
commands.info: provides information about the bot, including the notices for the terms of service and privacy policy.
commands.name:
changes the name for your account. 

-# name preferences are per-server instead of being universal. this is to protect your privacy.
commands.speed:
changes the speed of the tts for your account. 

value must be between **0.5** and **2.0**. 

-# speeds are per-server instead of being universal.
commands.lang:
changes the language of the tts for your account. 

supported languages: english, portuguese, korean, french, spanish. 

-# language preferences are per-server instead of being universal.
commands.clear:
clears the tts queue for the current server. 

requires **Manage Messages** permission.
commands.leave: forces the bot to disconnect from the voice channel.
commands.restrict:
restricts tts usage to only muted users. 

requires **Manage Channels** permission.
commands.unrestrict:
allows everyone to use tts. 

requires **Manage Channels** permission.
commands.skip:
skips the currently playing tts message. 

requires **Manage Messages** permission.
commands.tts:
manage your tts preferences. 

`/tts on`: turn on tts for your messages.
`/tts off`: turn off tts for your messages.
commands.settings: displays your current tts settings (voice, name, speed, lang).

info.title: # ostinato
info.subtitle: *giving a voice to the voiceless. and the socially awkward.*
info.privacySettings:
**your stuff** (stored locally per-server)
- **voice**: so you don't sound like a generic robot.
- **speed**: zoom zoom or slow motion.
- **name**: your alter ego.
- **language**: for when you want to sound fancy.
info.privacySystem:
**boring system data**
- **opt-out**: we remember if you told us to shut up (`/tts off`).
- **guild settings**: just to know if we should ignore unmuted people.
info.privacyFooter: -# we do not log your messages, generate audio files, or sell your data. your secrets are safe, mostly because they are probably boring.
info.tosBody: provided "as-is". adhere to discord tos. or don't. we aren't your parents.
info.versionFooter:
-# version: 1.2.7 | engine: supertonic v2 | [github](https://github.com/derpeloper/ostinato)
-# bugs? probably. features? definitely.

lang.duplicate: you already have **{langCode}** set as your preferred language.
lang.error: failed to save language setting. (db error)

leave.notInVoice: i am not in a voice channel. are you hearing voices?
leave.differentVoice: you must be in the same voice channel as me to disconnect me. nice try.
leave.error: i struggled to leave. this is awkward.

name.success: your name has been set to **{name}**.
name.duplicate: you already have the name **{name}** set.
name.error: there was an error saving your name.

speed.error: failed to save speed setting. (db error)

voice.duplicate: you already have the voice **{voiceId}** set.
voice.error: selected voice **{voiceId}** was not saved. (error while saving to db).
